com.atakmap.android.toolbar.widgets

Class TextContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.toolbar.widgets.TextContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapWidget.OnClickListener, MapWidget2.OnWidgetSizeChangedListener, java.lang.Runnable

    public class TextContainer
extends java.lang.Object
implements MapWidget.OnClickListener, java.lang.Runnable, MapWidget2.OnWidgetSizeChangedListener
    Text container to show prompts / information on the screen.
